details.excerpt: The ODI will be running three [Open Data Challenge Series](http://theodi.org/events/OpenDataChallengeSeries) programmes in 2013: Crime and Justice, Energy and the Environment and MiData.
details.content:
The ODI will be running three Open Data Challenge Series programmes in 2013: Crime and Justice, Energy and the Environment and MiData.

Planned dates for delivery

Series | Launch / open applications | Challenge Definition Day | Development / Acceleration period | Creation and Innovation Weekend | Incubation, mentoring and review period | Crime and Justice | 22 February 2013 | 20 March 2013 | March - Oct 2013 | 11 - 13 Oct 2013 | Oct 2013 - Jan 2014 | Energy and the Environment | September 2013 | 24 October 2013 | October - November 2013 | December 2013 | December 2013 - Feb 2014 | MiData | September 2013 | October 2013 | Oct - Jan 2013 | January 2013 | Jan 2013 - Mar 2014 |
